title: UWorld RxPrep Pharmacy Review
description:
WHY UWORLD RXPREP?

Trusted by top institutions and preferred by most graduates, the UWorld RxPrep Pharmacy app prepares you for the NAPLEX, MPJE, and CPJE with exam-like practice and top-tier learning tools developed by leading pharmacy experts.

PRACTICE 
- Prepare with exam-style questions, including case-based questions. 
- Understand the “why” with answer explanations for each question.
- Assess your readiness with customizable exam-level practice tests.
- Monitor progress by topic with detailed feedback summary reports. 

***** “Awesome way to spot-check my weak points and reinforce what I’m studying” -Amberly G 

WATCH
- Target key concepts with bite-sized video lectures for each course book chapter.
- Get guidance from board-certified pharmacists with 100+ years of combined experience. 

*****  “Thank you so much, I passed my pharmacy exam with flying colors. UWorld RxPrep is worth every penny!” -Michelle O.

SAVE TIME
- Create, customize, and study with spaced-repetition flashcards. 
- Seamlessly take and review digital notes as you study.

ALREADY HAVE A UWORLD ACCOUNT?

Log in to the UWorld RxPrep app using the email address and password associated with your existing account.

Contact support@uworld.com for additional support, questions, or feedback.
